categoryBlurb: Looking for the perfect gift for someone who has everything or loves the gift of music? At GiftStarter, we know that it can be a challenge when it comes to finding the perfect gift. Whether it’s for a birthday, anniversary, or just because... it’s time to bring everyone together to get a bigger, better gift. And we can help. To make it easy, we have curated our favorite ideas for group gifting.  Let them know from their community of family and friends how special they are with a group gift from GiftStarter.

productList.productDescription:
Not meant for the Sunday driver, the Motor Oil is designed for the rocker in all of us. The double-humbucker configuration is built for overdrive. Whether you rock like the British Invasion or the Sunset Strip, the Motor Oil is as gentle as a chainsaw.


THE SPECS


Model: Motor Oil!
Body: Recycled metal hollow body w/ removable back panel. Basswood frame for increased amplification and structural integrity
Neck Wood: Maple
Neck type: Bohemian Through-Body
Fretboard: Rosewood
Headstock: Red
Finish: Golden Glaze
Frets: 21
Nut Width: 1 3/4"
Width at 12th Fret: 2 1/8"
Width at 21st Fret: 2 3/8"
Neck Thickness: 7/8"
Scale Length: 25 1/2"
Hardware: Chrome
Tuners: 3R 3L screw in w/ removable keys
Bridge/Tailpiece: Tune-o-Matic
Pickups: Humbucker, Humbucker
Electronics: Volume, Tone
Switch: 3-way toggle
Self-standing: This model has a built in stand made from recycled rubber.
Inspired by South Africa. Designed in Atlanta. Produced in China.


Learn more here: https://www.bohemianguitars.com/bohemian-motor-oil-electric-guitar


Video: https://youtu.be/3cSLKoAfv6U
productList.productMetaDescription: Bohemian Guitar is designed for the rocker in all of us, built for over drive, and as gentle as a chainsaw. The perfect gift.

productList.productDescription:
The two single-coil pickups combined with the hollow metal Moonshine body give this guitar a rich twang and that oh-so-perfect amount of bite that can only come straight from the Appalachian still.


THE SPECS


Model: Moonshine
Body: Recycled metal hollow body w/ removable back panel. Basswood frame for increased amplification and structural integrity
Neck Wood: Maple
Neck type: Bohemian Through-Body
Fretboard: Rosewood

Finish: Black

Width at 12th Fret: 2 1/8"
Width at 21st Fret: 2 3/8"
Neck Thickness: 7/8"
Scale Length: 25 1/2"
Hardware: Chrome
Tuners: 3R 3L screw in w/ removable keys
Bridge/Tailpiece: Tune-o-Matic
Pickups: Single Coil, Single Coil
Electronics: Volume, Tone

Self-standing: This model has a built in stand made from recycled rubber.
Inspired by South Africa. Designed in Atlanta. Produced in China.


Learn more here: https://www.bohemianguitars.com/bohemian-moonshine-electric-guitar

productList.productDescription:
With the single coil pickup placed directly between the bridge and the neck, you get a full range of bass and treble, sweeter than the honey on your Grandma’s breakfast table. This guitar is the multipurpose-player’s dream.


THE SPECS


Model: Honey
Body: Recycled metal hollow body w/ removable back panel. Basswood frame for increased amplification and structural integrity
Neck Wood: Maple
Neck type: Bohemian Through-Body
Fretboard: Rosewood
Headstock: Golden Honey
Finish: Dark Honey
Frets: 21
Nut Width: 1 3/4"
Width at 12th Fret: 2 1/8"
Width at 21st Fret: 2 3/8"
Neck Thickness: 7/8"
Scale Length: 25 1/2"
Hardware: Chrome
Tuners: 3R 3L screw in w/ removable keys
Bridge/Tailpiece: Tune-o-Matic
Pickup: Single Coil
Electronics: Volume, Tone
Switch: None
Self-standing: This model has a built in stand made from recycled rubber.
Inspired by South Africa. Designed in Atlanta. Produced in China.


Learn more here: https://www.bohemianguitars.com/bohemian-honey-electric-guitar


Video:https://youtu.be/npuI4iynJeE

productList.productDescription:
The Surf Wax is the brightest sounding of the Boho series. The P90 pickup can be as crisp, mellow and glassy as a calm day at the beach, or add a little gain and it’ll crush you like the break on the Banzai Pipeline.


THE SPECS


Model: Surfwax
Body: Metal hollow body w/ removable back panel. Basswood skeleton for increased amplification and structural integrity.
Neck Wood: Maple
Neck type: Bohemian Through-Body
Fretboard: Rosewood
Headstock: Yellow
Finish: Natural
Frets: 21
Nut Width: 1 3/4"
Width at 12th Fret: 2 1/8"
Width at 21st Fret: 2 3/8"
Neck Thickness: 7/8"
Scale Length: 25 1/2"
Hardware: Chrome
Tuners: 3R 3L screw in w/ removable keys
Bridge/Tailpiece: Tune-o-Matic
Pickup: P90
Electronics: Volume, Tone
Switch: None
Self-standing: This model has a built in stand made from recycled rubber.
Inspired by South Africa. Designed in Atlanta. Produced in China.


Learn more here: https://www.bohemianguitars.com/bohemian-surfwax-electric-guitar


Video:  https://youtu.be/iKTKkTilRbo
